subject: Delivery failures to contoso.com
body: Hi team, our notifications to contoso.com are bouncing. Between 08:50-09:10 UTC we tried ops@contoso.com and invoices@contoso.com and got 550 5.1.1 errors. Please advise.

subject: Webhook retries keep failing
body: Since 18:00 UTC yesterday our webhook deliveries to https://hooks.orbit.example are retrying and failing with 500 responses. Any known incidents?

subject: EU login MFA timeouts
body: Engineers in EU cannot complete MFA. Around 07:05 UTC the push requests time out on both mobile and desktop.
